trans-unit.source: Defines a metadata attribute that is used to specify the number of allowed instances of a template.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute> class allows you to mark a template property as one that allows single or multiple instantiations.
A template that only allows a single instantiation can have the controls that are contained inside of it referenced.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> property is an example of a property that can be instantiated only one time.
This <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute> class is optional.
If a template property is not extended with a <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute> class, the default value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute.Multiple> field, is used.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance"></xref> enumeration value.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance"></xref> enumeration value.
Defines the default value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> class.
This field is read-only.
The default behavior is to create multiple instances of the template using the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance.Multiple> enumeration value.

Indicates whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object and is identical to the this <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to test.

`true` if value is both a <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object and is identical to the this <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object; otherwise `false`.
Gets a hash code for this <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object.
The hash code for this <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance"></xref> enumeration value that the current template instance represents.
The possible values are either the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute.Single> field or the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance.Multiple> field.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstance"></xref> enumeration value that the current template instance represents.

Returns a value indicating if the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object is the same as the default <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> object.
The default value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute> class is the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute.Multiple> field.
`true` if the value of the current instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> is the default; otherwise, `false`.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> class as one representing a template that will be instantiated multiple times.
This field is read-only.
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute.Multiple> field is accessed, a new template instance is instantiated multiple times.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute"></xref> class as one representing a template that will be instantiated a single time.
This field is read-only.
If the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateInstanceAttribute.Single> field is accessed, a new template instance is instantiated a single time.
